DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the long-term safety and efficacy of KAD-1229 as combination therapy with biguanide or DPP-4 inhibitor in type 2 diabetes patients who show inadequate glycemic control with diet, and biguanide or DPP-4 inhibitor monotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Study of KAD-1229 in Type 2 Diabetes Patients
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes patients who show inadequate glycemic control with diet, and biguanide or DPP4 inhibitor monotherapy Age in the 20 years or over inclusive HbA1c in the range of â‰¥ 6.5 to < 9% Type 1 diabetes mellitus Patients with serious diabetic complications and other serious complications
